prompts: Create a small, metallic Pokemon with magnetic features and a sleek body shape.
Generate a unique Electric-type Pokemon that resembles a magnet and has a shiny surface.
Imagine a Pokemon with a round body and two powerful magnets attached, showcasing electricity.
Design a Pokemon that floats in the air, made of metal and capable of generating electricity.
Show me a tiny Pokemon with a steel exterior and a magnetic personality, ready for battle.
Give me a visual of a Pokemon that combines technology and nature with a magnetic twist.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a magnet but has a cute, friendly expression.

distinctive_features: Two large magnets on either side
